short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A homework extension designed to ease homework sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Tackler is a collection of extensions designed to ease the use of multiple homework platforms including Sparx, Educake, Seneca, and more by providing a range of features.

V3 is now out!

Task Tackler now has a dashboard for settings, data and bug reporting at https://www.task-tackler.com/dashboard

Sparx:
- Built in answer revealer for most questions
- Automatic bookwork saving and filling
- Built in calculator (desmos)
- Built in Gemini (premium)

Educake:
- Auto completion of quizzes
- Adds keybinds

Know it all ninja:
- Auto answer questions
- Skip intro section

Seneca:
- Auto fills input section


https://github.com/davedude1011/taskTackler
